details: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in E-Kalite Software Hardware Engineering Design and Internet Services Industry and Trade Ltd. Co. Turboard allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Turboard: from 2025.07 through 11022026.Â NOTE: The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
